channel.title: Harddd taskk
channel.description:
Okk
I Just Added A Pk Area - With a safe zone..
okkk
i got a thing that blocks the entrance to the pk area
i want to know how to be able to click on the Blocking Object - In My Case a flight of stairs haha
an then a screen come up saying
are u sure u want to be teled into the pk area ?
with options yes or no
if you click yes i want it to tele you , if you click no i want another screen coming up saying okk good bye..
then you click Good Bye and the screen closes an u can continue wid ure game.
